item.description:
The French Biotech Tour - Biomarkers & Personalized Medicine

Thursday, May 24 2012
8:30 am – 6:30 pm

This event was posted by UBIFRANCE

Type of EventOther Events

Category N/A (View All)

Committee N/A (View All)

Event Inquiries

clemence.dascanio@ubifrance.fr - 415 568 4581

Location: Philadelphia

The French Biotechnology Clusters and UBIFRANCE are pleased to invite you to the 6th edition of “THE FRENCH BIOTECH TOUR”. This new edition will explore the theme of BIOMARKER AND PERSONALIZED MEDICINE.

Join us in Philadelphia, on May, 24th 2012 to find R&D collaborators, learn about new in- and out-licensing opportunities, and increase your international network.

Don’t miss this opportunity to network with potential strategic partners!

 

What is the French Biotech Tour event?

Our objective is to provide US and French biotech companies, working in Biomarker and Personalized Medicine, with the opportunity to explore transatlantic partnerships (licensing, R&D collaborations, etc.).

 

Whatcan you expect?

This unique one-day opportunity is free of charge and includes:

- Presentations from industry experts (French and American)

- One on one business meetings with potential partners and collaborators

- Networking opportunities

 

When and where?

- May, 24th 2012 in a downtown Philadelphia hotel, from 8:30 am to 6:30 pm. Exact location to be announced.

 

 

Who should attend?

- Biotech Firms

- Pharma Companies

- Research and Academic Institutions

For a list of French companies that will be participating in the event, click here. Be sure to check back often as this information is regularly updated.

 

 

How can I participate?

Registration is free of charge and available on our website:

http://frenchbiotechtour.ubifrance-events.com/cms/en/welcome-biomarker

Space is limited. Please be sure to register online.
item.name: The French Biotech Tour
